McFarland, p. 511, {{ISBN|0786457635}}. October 26, 1956) is an American actress, singer, and producer. Her film appearances include ''[[Volunteers (1985 film)|Volunteers]]'' (1985), ''[[Sleepless in Seattle]]'' (1993), ''[[Now and Then (film)|Now and Then]]'' (1995), ''[[That Thing You Do!]]'' (1996), ''[[Jingle All the Way]]'' (1996), ''[[The Story of Us (film)|The Story of Us]]'' (1999), ''[[Runaway Bride (film)|Runaway Bride]]'' (1999), ''[[It's Complicated (film)|It's Complicated]]'' (2009), and ''[[Larry Crowne]]'' (2011), and she appeared in the television series ''[[The Good Wife]]'' and ''[[Girls (TV series)|Girls]]''. Wilson has performed on Broadway and produced several films, including ''[[My Big Fat Greek Wedding]]'' (2002). As a singer-songwriter, Wilson has released the albums ''AM/FM'', ''Rita Wilson'', ''Bigger Picture'', and ''Halfway to Home''. The letter was addressed to [[Angela Merkel]] and [[Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma]], urging them to focus on women as they serve as the head of the G7 in Germany and the AU in South Africa respectively. The G7 and AU were expected to set the priorities in development funding before a main UN summit in September 2015 that was to establish new development goals for the generation.{{cite news |first=Tracy |last=McVeigh |url=https://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2015/mar/07/povert-sexist-letter-women-equality-gaga-sandberg-beyonce |title=Poverty is sexist: leading women sign up for global equality | Life and style |newspaper=The Guardian |access-date=May 8, 2015 |archive-date=May 18, 2015 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150518082544/http://www.theguardian.com/lifeandstyle/2015/mar/07/povert-sexist-letter-women-equality-gaga-sandberg-beyonce |url-status=live }} == Philanthropy == For over 20 years, Wilson and her husband, Tom Hanks, have been honorary co-chairs along with [[Steven Spielberg]] and [[Kate Capshaw]] of the Women's Cancer Research Fund (WCRF), specializing in raising money for women's cancers.{{cite news |last1=Chuba |first1=Kirsten |title=Women's Cancer Research Fund Honors Sofia Vergara, Jennifer Hudson for Activism |url=https://variety.com/2018/scene/vpage/sofia-vergara-jennifer-hudson-womens-cancer-research-fund-1202712855/ |access-date=October 2, 2018 |work=Variety |date=February 28, 2018 |archive-date=December 24, 2022 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20221224115100/https://variety.com/2018/scene/vpage/sofia-vergara-jennifer-hudson-womens-cancer-research-fund-1202712855/ |url-status=live }} In 2016, WCRF joined forces with [[Evelyn Lauder]]'s Breast Cancer Research Foundation.{{citation needed|date=April 2019}} Wilson contributed to the [[H. Lee Moffitt Cancer Center & Research Institute|Moffitt Cancer Center]] by donating "True Hearts" jewelry made of sterling silver and 14k gold. Wilson has credited [[Rosie O'Donnell]] as inspiration for her charitable work, particularly with cancer and children's charities.[http://www.moffitt.org/Site.aspx?spid=D99741DE33B440CA9EC34636B6C9B53F H.
